QuestData.Title: The Waking Shores Advanced Tour
QuestData.Description:
Now that you've flown the basic courses all over the Dragon Isles and proved your ability, how about a new challenge?
The advanced race courses are similar to the standard courses you have flown, but many have adjusted flight paths or extra obstacles to test your skill.
Let us start with the courses in the Waking Shores!
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly each of the advanced courses in Waking Shores.
